abstract: Statoil, Norway’s largest oil and gas company, has tapped Bank of America, Citigroup and ABG Sundal Collier to manage the initial public offering of its fuel and retail unit, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with knowledge of the transaction.
snippet: Statoil, Norway’s largest oil and gas company, has tapped Bank of America, Citigroup and ABG Sundal Collier to manage the initial public offering of its fuel and retail unit, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with knowledge of the transac...
lead_paragraph: Statoil, Norway’s largest oil and gas company, has tapped Bank of America, Citigroup and ABG Sundal Collier to manage the initial public offering of its fuel and retail unit, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with knowledge of the transaction.

headline.main: Statoil Said to Tap Citi, BofA for $1 Billion I.P.O.
